info.description: This OAS file describes the NGSI-LD API defined by the ETSI ISG CIM group. This Cross-domain Context Information Management API allows to provide, consume and subscribe to context information in multiple scenarios and involving multiple stakeholders
info.title: ETSI ISG CIM / NGSI-LD API

externalDocs.description: Find out more about the ETSI ISG Context Information Management

tags.name: NGSI-LD API
tags.description: API defined by the ETSI ISG CIM

get.description: Retrieve a set of entities which matches a specific query from an NGSI-LD system

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Comma separated list of URIs to be retrieved

parameters.name: idPattern
parameters.description: Regular expression that must be matched by Entity ids

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Comma separated list of Entity type names to be retrieved

parameters.name: attrs
parameters.description: Comma separated list of attribute names (properties or relationships) to be retrieved

parameters.name: geoproperty
parameters.description: The name of the property that contains the geo-spatial data that will be used to resolve the geoquery

post.description: Create a new Entity within an NGSI-LD system

201.description: Created. Contains the resource URI of the created Entity

get.description: Retrieve an specific Entity from an NGSI-LD system. It's possible to specify the Entity attributes to be retrieved by using query parameters

parameters.name: attrs
parameters.description: Comma separated list of attribute names (properties or relationships) to be retrieved

delete.description: Removes an specific Entity from an NGSI-LD system

204.description: No Content. The entity was removed successfully

post.description: Append new Entity attributes to an existing Entity within an NGSI-LD system

parameters.name: options
parameters.description: Indicates that no attribute overwrite shall be performed

207.description: Partial Success. Only the attributes included in the response payload were successfully appended

patch.description: Update existing Entity attributes within an NGSI-LD system

207.description: Partial Success. Only the attributes included in the response payload were successfully updated

patch.description: Update existing Entity attributes within an NGSI-LD system

delete.description: Removes an existing Entity attribute within an NGSI-LD system

get.description: Retrieves the subscriptions available in an NGSI-LD system

post.description: Creates a new Subscription within an NGSI-LD system

201.description: Created. Contains the resource URI of the created Subscription

get.description: Retrieves a specific Subscription from an NGSI-LD system

patch.description: Updates a specific Subscription within an NGSI-LD system

204.description: No Content. The Subscription was updated successfully

delete.description: Removes a specific Subscription from an NGSI-LD system

204.description: No Content. The Subscription was removed successfully

get.description: Retrieve a set of context sources which matches a specific query from an NGSI-LD system

post.description: Registers a new context source within an NGSI-LD system

location.title: geometry
location.description: One geometry as defined by GeoJSON. Licensed as per original source is https://github.com/fge/sample-json-schemas/blob/master/geojson/geometry.json

lineString.description: An array of two or more positions

linearRing.description: An array of four positions where the first equals the last

201.description: Created. Contains the resource URI of the created Registration

get.description: Retrieves a specific context source registration from an NGSI-LD system

delete.description: Removes an specific context source registration within an NGSI-LD system

204.description: No Content. The Registration was removed successfully

get.description: Retrieves the context source discovery subscriptions available in an NGSI-LD system

post.description: Creates a context source discovery Subscription within an NGSI-LD system

201.description: Created. Contains the resource URI of the created Subscription

get.description: Retrieves a specific Subscription from an NGSI-LD system

patch.description: Updates a specific context source discovery Subscription within an NGSI-LD system

204.description: No Content. The Subscription was updated successfully

delete.description: Removes a specific Context Source Subscription from an NGSI-LD system

204.description: No Content. The Subscription was removed successfully

get.description: Query temporal evolution of Entities from an NGSI-LD system

parameters.name: timeproperty
parameters.description: The name of the property that contains the temporal data that will be used to resolve the temporal query

items.title: NGSI-LD Entity
items.description: NGSI-LD Temporal Representation of an Entity

post.description: Create or update temporal representation of an Entity within an NGSI-LD system

201.description: Created. Contains the resource URI of the created Entity

get.description: Retrieve the temporal representation of an specific Entity from an NGSI-LD system. It's possible to specify the Entity attributes to be retrieved by using query parameters

delete.description: Removes the temporal representation of an Entity from an NGSI-LD system

204.description: No Content. The entity was removed successfully

post.description: Add new attributes to an existing Temporal Entity within an NGSI-LD system

delete.description: Attribute from Temporal Representation of Entity deletion

patch.description: Allows modifying a specific Attribute (Property or Relationship) instance, identified by its instanceId, of a Temporal Representation of an Entity.

delete.description: Attribute Instance deletion by instance id.
